allthearcanistgear.perk_desc.thread_flig: Grants creative flight. Must be equipped in a slot of at least level 4.
allthearcanistgear.perk_desc.thread_spec: Grants spectral sight, allowing you to see creatures through walls. Gives sight in a radius of 8 blocks per level.
allthearcanistgear.perk_desc.thread_true: Grants True Sight, allowing you to see more of your surroundings. Tier 1 grants Nightvision, Tier 2 grants immunity to Blindness, Tier 3 grants immunity to Darkness, Tier 4 grants lava vision.
allthearcanistgear.perk_desc.thread_vita: Grants an extra heart for each level.
chat.allthearcanistgear.low_tier: Breaking this block requires a more powerful spell book.
chat.allthearcanistgear.too_weak: Breaking this block requires more amplification.
